entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carignan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.7°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
